column4: News;Phnom Penh: ------More than 500 workers gathered on the morning of September 7
column5: 2018 along National Road No. 4 in an attempt to march to the National Assembly. They were demanding a solution after a factory closure left them without the correct benefits.------According to the workers
column6: after the factory relocated and the directors left for China
column7: the company has not paid compensation to some 2500 workers yet.------The procession of more than 500 workers was approved by  Por Sen Chey district from 9th district. but was prevented from reaching the national assembly by police.------http://tnn-news.com/archives/121685------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/699754.html------
